headline: Churchill Downs: A Solid 'Buy On The Dip' Story Poised For A Fast Rise Before The Derby (Rating Upgrade)
summary: CHDN is trading at a premium to its sector, making it a 'buy on the dip' target. We expect 16%+ of EBITDA growth in 2025. Read the full stock report on Seeking Alpha.
